author: Legolover9531
title: Why so serious?!
review:
Batman's most iconic villian has his own Ultrabuild. What do I think about it? Read on to find out!

 

Box/Instructions

Like the other Superhero Ultrabuilds, it comes in a cardboard box. On the back it show all the features and what him and Green Latern look like combined.

Parts

Like other Ultrabuilds, these parts are extremely helpful for building heros for Hero Factory. I love the hair on Joker's head, as it's rubber! LEGO did a good job with the parts.

The build

The build was easy and took me probably around 10 minutes. Even the smallest of kids won't have a problem, but they might need help with some parts.

The completed model

The model looks great, as if it was straight out of a classic comic! The details are great, and FYI, the tails are for his coat!

Summary

Overall, if you're a Batman fan, this is a must buy!
